title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
content:
Servers are like computer they are used to run a heavy duty work.

cloud is a remote infrastructure computing is compute resources.

IAM Resources : Identity and Access Management, global services, two types of account root and user, groups are created to have same type of access, json documents give policies and group.

title: AWS IAM
content:
Identity and Access Management, global services, two types of account root and user, groups are created to have same type of access, json documents give policies and group.

Policies: We can make policies on how to and what to give access to

Roles: Some AWS Services will need to perform action on your behalf that is an example of allocating roles, permissions on AWS services

IAM Security Tools: 
1) IAM Credentials Reports (Account level)
2) IAM access advisor (user level)
